name: Tata Nexon EV
description: The price of Tata Nexon EV, a Compact SUV, ranges from Rs. 14.49  - 19.49 Lakh. It is available in 10 variants. Nexon EV comes with 6 airbags. Tata Nexon EV has a ground clearance of 205 mm  and is available in 8 colours. Users have reported a driving range of 395 Km for Nexon EV.
